<!-- Begin: Breadcrumb -->
      <p id="breadcrumb"><a href="/index.shtml">Bureau Home</a> &gt; <a href="/weather/index.shtml">Weather and Warnings</a> &gt; <a href="/vic/index.shtml">Victoria</a> &gt; <a href="/vic/forecasts/index.shtml">Forecasts</a> &gt; <strong>Melbourne Metropolitan Area</strong></p>
<!-- End: Breadcrumb -->

      <h1>Melbourne Metropolitan Area</h1>
<!-- Start: Content -->
      <div id="content">

<p class="warning"><a href="/vic/warnings/">View the current warnings for Victoria</a></p>
<p class="date">Forecast issued at 4:20 pm EDT on Sunday 6 March 2011.</p><div class="day eve">
<h2>Forecast for the rest of Sunday</h2>
<div class="forecast">
<dl>
<dt>Summary</dt>

<dd class="image"><img src="/images/symbols/large/clear.png" alt="" width="45" height="42"></dd>
<dd class="summary">Clear.</dd>
</dl>
<h3>Metropolitan area</h3>
<p>Clear. Winds north to northeasterly averaging 10 to 20 km/h.</p>
<p class="clr"> </p>
</div>
</div><div class="day main">
<h2>Monday 7 March</h2>
<div class="forecast">
<dl>
<dt>Summary</dt>

<dd class="image"><img src="/images/symbols/large/wind.png" alt="" width="45" height="42"></dd>
<dd>Min <em class="min">17</em>
</dd>
<dd>Max <em class="max">30</em>
</dd>
<dd class="summary">Windy. Mostly sunny.</dd>
</dl>
<h3>Metropolitan area</h3>
<p>Mostly sunny. Winds north to northeasterly averaging up to 35 km/h becoming northerly up to 40 km/h during the morning.</p>
<p class="clr"> </p>

</div>
<p class="alert">Fire Danger -  High</p>
<p class="alert">UV Alert from 10:10 am to 4:50 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 9 [Very High]</p>
</div><div class="around"><table summary="">
<caption>Around Melbourne</caption>
<thead><tr>
<th class="first">Location</th>
<th title="Minimum Temperature">Min</th>
<th title="Maximum Temperature">Max</th>
</tr></thead>
<tbody>

<tr>
<td scope="row" class="first"><a href="/vic/forecasts/melbourne.shtml" title="Melbourne Forecast">Melbourne</a></td>
<td>17</td>
<td>30</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td scope="row" class="first"><a href="/vic/forecasts/geelong.shtml" title="Geelong Forecast">Geelong</a></td>
<td>15</td>
<td>30</td>
</tr>
<tr>

<td scope="row" class="first"><a href="/vic/forecasts/yarraglen.shtml" title="Yarra Glen Forecast">Yarra Glen</a></td>
<td>14</td>
<td>29</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td scope="row" class="first"><a href="/vic/forecasts/frankston.shtml" title="Frankston Forecast">Frankston</a></td>
<td>16</td>
<td>27</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td scope="row" class="first"><a href="/vic/forecasts/tullamarine.shtml" title="Tullamarine Forecast">Tullamarine</a></td>

<td>15</td>
<td>29</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td scope="row" class="first"><a href="/vic/forecasts/mountdandenong.shtml" title="Mount Dandenong Forecast">Mount Dandenong</a></td>
<td>12</td>
<td>23</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td scope="row" class="first"><a href="/vic/forecasts/laverton.shtml" title="Laverton Forecast">Laverton</a></td>
<td>16</td>

<td>30</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td scope="row" class="first"><a href="/vic/forecasts/scoresby.shtml" title="Scoresby Forecast">Scoresby</a></td>
<td>15</td>
<td>29</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td scope="row" class="first"><a href="/vic/forecasts/watsonia.shtml" title="Watsonia Forecast">Watsonia</a></td>
<td>16</td>
<td>29</td>

</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div><div class="day">
<h2>Tuesday 8 March</h2>
<div class="forecast">
<dl>
<dt>Summary</dt>
<dd class="image"><img src="/images/symbols/large/rain.png" alt="" width="45" height="42"></dd>
<dd>Min <em class="min">19</em>
</dd>
<dd>Max <em class="max">23</em>

</dd>
<dd class="summary">A little rain developing.</dd>
</dl>
<h3>Metropolitan area</h3>
<p>Cloudy. Patchy rain developing during the morning. Winds northerly averaging up to 50 km/h.</p>
<p class="clr"> </p>
</div>
</div><div class="day">
<h2>Wednesday 9 March</h2>
<div class="forecast">
<dl>
<dt>Summary</dt>

<dd class="image"><img src="/images/symbols/large/rain.png" alt="" width="45" height="42"></dd>
<dd>Min <em class="min">20</em>
</dd>
<dd>Max <em class="max">23</em>
</dd>
<dd class="summary">Rain at times.</dd>
</dl>
<h3>Metropolitan area</h3>
<p>Cloudy. Areas of rain. Winds north to northwesterly averaging up to 25 km/h tending northeasterly up to 20 km/h by early evening.</p>
<p class="clr"> </p>

</div>
</div><div class="day">
<h2>Thursday 10 March</h2>
<div class="forecast">
<dl>
<dt>Summary</dt>
<dd class="image"><img src="/images/symbols/large/rain.png" alt="" width="45" height="42"></dd>
<dd>Min <em class="min">17</em>
</dd>
<dd>Max <em class="max">21</em>
</dd>

<dd class="summary">Morning rain then showers.</dd>
</dl>
<h3>Metropolitan area</h3>
<p>Cloudy. Rain, easing to isolated showers later in the day. Isolated thunderstorms possible during the morning. Winds northwesterly averaging up to 25 km/h tending southerly around midday.</p>
<p class="clr"> </p>
</div>
</div><div class="day">
<h2>Friday 11 March</h2>
<div class="forecast">
<dl>
<dt>Summary</dt>

<dd class="image"><img src="/images/symbols/large/partly-cloudy.png" alt="" width="45" height="42"></dd>
<dd>Min <em class="min">15</em>
</dd>
<dd>Max <em class="max">25</em>
</dd>
<dd class="summary">Partly cloudy.</dd>
</dl>
<h3>Metropolitan area</h3>
<p>Partly cloudy. Winds east to southeasterly averaging up to 30 km/h.</p>
<p class="clr"> </p>

</div>
</div><div class="day">
<h2>Saturday 12 March</h2>
<div class="forecast">
<dl>
<dt>Summary</dt>
<dd class="image"><img src="/images/symbols/large/partly-cloudy.png" alt="" width="45" height="42"></dd>
<dd>Min <em class="min">14</em>
</dd>
<dd>Max <em class="max">26</em>
</dd>

<dd class="summary">Mostly sunny.</dd>
</dl>
<h3>Metropolitan area</h3>
<p>Partly cloudy. Light winds.</p>
<p class="clr"> </p>
</div>
</div><div class="day">
<h2>Sunday 13 March</h2>
<div class="forecast">
<dl>
<dt>Summary</dt>

<dd class="image"><img src="/images/symbols/large/showers.png" alt="" width="45" height="42"></dd>
<dd>Min <em class="min">16</em>
</dd>
<dd>Max <em class="max">23</em>
</dd>
<dd class="summary">Shower or two.</dd>
</dl>
<h3>Metropolitan area</h3>
<p>Cloudy. Isolated showers. Winds south to southwesterly averaging up to 20 km/h tending south to southeasterly during the evening.</p>
<p class="clr"> </p>

</div>
</div><p id="next" class="date">The next routine forecast will be issued at 5:00 am EDT Monday.</p><p class="p-id">Product derived from IDV10450</p>

      </div>
<!-- End: Content -->
    </div>
<!-- End: Container -->

<h3 class="leftmenu" id="local-nav"><a href="/weather/">Weather &amp; Warnings</a></h3>

  <li><a href="/australia/index.shtml" title="National Weather &amp; Warnings">Australia</a>
  	<ul>
      <li><a href="/australia/warnings/index.shtml" title="National Warnings Summary">Warnings Summary</a></li>

      <li><a href="/australia/flood/index.shtml" title="National Flood Warnings, Rainfall &amp; River Conditions">Rainfall &amp; River Conditions</a></li>
    </ul>
  </li>
  <li><a href="/nsw/index.shtml" title="New South Wales Weather &amp; Warnings">New South Wales</a>

  <li><a href="/tsunami/">Tsunami Warnings</a></li>
<!--  <li><a href="/hydro/flood/">Flood Warnings</a></li>
-->  <li><a href="/australia/charts/">Weather Maps</a></li>
  <li><a href="/satellite/">Satellite Images</a></li>
  <li><a href="/watl/">Agriculture</a></li>
  <li><a href="/marine/">Marine</a></li>
  <li><a href="/uv/">UV Protection</a></li>

</ul>

</div>
<!-- End: Left Column -->

<div class="clr"><!-- clear columns --></div>
</div>
<!-- End: Columns -->
</div>
<!-- End: PageHeight -->

<!-- Google Analytics -->
<script type="text/javascript">
  var hostname = window.location.hostname;
  var host = hostname.split(".");
  if (host[0] == "reg")
  {
    document.write("<!--No Analytics Yet -->");
  }
  else if (host[0] == "www")
  {
    var _gaq = _gaq || [];
    _gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-3816559-1']);
    _gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);

    (function() {
      var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
      ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
      var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
    })();
  }
  else if (host[0] == "wdev")
  {
    document.write("<!--No Analytics Yet -->");
  }
</script>

  </body>
</html>
